SEARCH
Package org.example

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
org.example.GameBoard
public class GameBoard extends Object
Represents the game board for the Pebble Game. Handles the initialization of the board, placement of pebbles, and movement of pebbles.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameBoard(int boardSize)
    Constructs a GameBoard with the specified size.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameBoard

      public GameBoard(int boardSize)
      Constructs a GameBoard with the specified size. Initializes the board and places pebbles for both players.
      Parameters:
      boardSize - the size of the game board

  • Method Details

    • getBoard

      public String[][] getBoard()
      Gets the current game board.
      Returns:
      the game board

    • getWhiteCount

      public int getWhiteCount()
      Gets the count of white pebbles on the board.
      Returns:
      the number of white pebbles

    • getBlackCount

      public int getBlackCount()
      Gets the count of black pebbles on the board.
      Returns:
      the number of black pebbles

    • decrementCount

      public void decrementCount(String color)
      Decreases the count of the specified color's pebbles.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the pebble to decrement ("White" or "Black")

    • initializeBoard

      public void initializeBoard()
      Initializes the game board by setting all tiles to null and placing pebbles for both players. The board is populated with an equal number of white and black pebbles.

    • movePebble

      public void movePebble(int row, int col, int newRow, int newCol)
      Moves a pebble from the specified position to a new position on the board.
      Parameters:
      row - the row of the current pebble position
      col - the column of the current pebble position
      newRow - the row of the new position
      newCol - the column of the new position

    • setPebble

      public void setPebble(int row, int col, String color)
      Sets the pebble color at the specified position on the board.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the board
      col - the column index of the board
      color - the color of the pebble, either "White" or "Black"
